summary: Project Manager / BA with over 10 years of experience with expertise in requirements gathering, process development and enhancement, team building, testing, and communication within the software life cycle.In depth knowledge of Rational Unified Process, Agile, and Software Design Lifecycle (SDLC).Experience in Request Center and Remedy environments, financial and utility industries, .net and Web development projects, large to small scale projects, ability to juggle many roles and hats and work in cross-matrixed team environments.Specialties: project management, requirements gathering, team building, metrics reporting, use cases, test plans, test cases, user manuals, project management skills, SDLC, business process analysis, gap analysis, User Acceptance Testing, communication between the business and the developers, and herding kittens!
